sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.OIDC_Helper</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>OIDC_Helper</name> <script><![CDATA[var OIDC_Helper = Class.create(); OIDC_Helper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { importWellKnownConfig: function() { var config_data = this.getParameter("sysparm_config_data"); var result = SNC.GlideMultiSSO.loadOIDCWellKnownConfiguration(config_data); return result; }, type: 'OIDC_Helper' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-06 10:07:57</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8b4c57e787820010c1e95773e8cb0b8c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>OIDC_Helper</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Integration - Multiple Provider Single Sign-On (do not activate...use 'Integration - Multiple Provid" source="com.snc.integration.sso.multi">4762a9692fe21110d8a4d5f62799b613</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8b4c57e787820010c1e95773e8cb0b8c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-17 03:41:27</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>336</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
